name: df-bn
body: |- wceq(cbn, crab(s0, cin(cnvc, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, cv(s0)), ccms)))
comment: Define the class of all Banach spaces. A Banach space is a normed vector space such that both the vector space and the scalar field are complete under their respective norm-induced metrics. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
